channel.title: King Guard Broken
channel.description:
I think King's guard should be more like Merc guard where it prevents all visitors to that target. Guarding your last confirmed BD just to vote the final evil player to find out that your confirmed BD was converted through your guard seems really broken. Second king feels really weak with no way to truly protect their people.
Maybe there's a reason I havent considered why they should be able to be converted through the guard. If not please consider the change. Thank you.

item.title: King Guard Broken
item.dc:creator: Aquillion
item.description:
DustoffKay:

Guarding your last confirmed BD just to vote the final evil player to find out that your confirmed BD was converted through your guard seems really broken.

What’s broken about it? I honestly do not see any problem with it at all. It makes it harder to trust someone 100%, which is important for gameplay, and prevents BD from having “easy” strategies where they can perfectly protect everyone important.

I’m just not seeing any real benefit to this suggestion. King doesn’t need a buff. BD doesn’t need a buff. Conversions don’t need a nerf. And I don’t see how this would improve gameplay.

It seems like you’re expressing a vague feeling of “I don’t like how this feels”, but I have to say that my reading is just that you’re annoyed that it happened to you in-game - this suggestion feels like a “plz nerf scissors. signed, paper” sort of thing. Conversion being the weakness in death-based protection seems to me to be a valuable design choice that forces people to plan for more potential scenarios.

item.title: King Guard Broken
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
I think that CW needs to change focus, as it’s pretty useless as it is. Since there are usually 2 kills per night on average, that gives Physician two chances per night to save someone (unless there’s a reaper, but it’s still one). This doesn’t even include poison or bleeding.

On the other hand, magic barrier has 1 chance every 2 nights in order to stop a conversion.

I’d focus CW more on tornado, and then maybe this could work.

item.title: King Guard Broken
item.dc:creator: Aquillion
item.description:
NightX:

I do think it would be good if the Good King could prevent conversions. It would be negative utility for an Evil King.

We can’t give it to only one and not the other, since that would potentially out an evil king if someone they protected ends up converted and gets caught.

Beyond that, I just don’t think this is a good idea. The king doesn’t need to be more powerful, the Unseen / Cult don’t need the nerf, the CW needs preventing conversion as a purpose, and missing a conversion hurts Cult / Unseen far more than missing a kill. I’m not seeing the argument for this change.
